sentences.english: Most Hakka groups of Kaohsiung County live inMeinong.
sentences.chinese: 高雄縣的客家族羣主要住在美濃。

sentences.english: Oiled paper umbrellas made by Meinung Guangrong in Kaohsiung are the most representative.
sentences.chinese: 其中以高雄“美濃廣榮興造”的油紙傘，最具代表性。

sentences.english: Spending weekends at grandpa's cottage at Mei-Nong is the most joyful thing for me.
sentences.chinese: 每個週末回美濃老家度假是我最開心的事。
